name: Spam Oborona YandexCleanWeb
author: Djon

sections.installation:
While doing the installation procedure, it is recommended to go through all the steps first before viewing the output. If you don’t, you’ll get nasty error messages.

For those with Sidebar Widget compatible themes

  1. Upload folder spam-oborona-yandexcleanweb to the /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:

short_description: The fight against spam in comments by free service Yandex .NET Web

screenshots.caption: Меню настроек плагина предельно простое.1) Вам нужно получить бесплатный ключ для подключения к сервису Чистый Веб 2) И всё, плагин начинает автоматически работать. Settings menu plugin extremely prostoe 1) You need to get a free key to connect to the service Net Web 2) And all the plugin automatically starts to work.
